name: Goodbye Neoma
description:
GAME

Goodbye Neoma is a short indie video game set in a visually pleasing world, ruled by strange entities called "Guardians". Explore your surroundings as you learn more about the truth of this twisted place.

CONTROLS

  • WASD -> Move
  • You cannot jump
  • Shift -> Run

CREDITS

Story, Game -> Nohodom

Music (in order) ->

  • Entoma - Background Music 1
  • Entoma - Background Music 2
  • zakè - Infinite Ocean
  • Entoma - Background Music 3
  • Kazuma Kubota - Blue Fish

Special thanks to Ninjapretzel and Totathy
